responses.content: Dreamforce has been such an incredible part of our culture that we're all going to miss Dreamforce this year. But we've already started some amazing things online, and we're getting some phenomenal results with over 75 million views...

We've built Work.com to help businesses get back to work safely. We've also retrained everyone with Trailhead to become rangers, focusing on employee well-being and mental health...
This moment is both humbling and bittersweet. We've had to reimagine our business and remain relevant by transforming how we engage with customers digitally...

Our relevance to customers has never been stronger. Products like Work.com are essential for businesses to operate safely and effectively in the current environment...
Confidence is building almost week by week. We're seeing better visibility for bookings not just in Q2 but into Q3 and Q4 as well. Our products remain highly relevant, especially Work.com...
